title: [MSBuild Server] Consume the client library in dotnet CLI
body:
Integrate the library introduced in #7373 into the dotnet CLI process and use it instead of loading `msbuild.dll`.

Acceptance criteria: The CLI will use the library by default with an opt-out switch. CLI tests pass and there is no major observable difference between running MSBuild server vs. the current way of loading `msbuild.dll` into the CLI process.
